Texts.Chs: ^orange;Frackin'Universe数据库^reset;只做一件事:^green;告知能在相应的生产站所能制造的物品^reset;。试着在自己的的^orange;自动组装器^reset;做一台。做好了就展示给我看。
Texts.Eng: A ^orange;Lab Directory^reset; does only one thing: ^green;Telling you what makes what^reset; in your production stations. Try making one now in your ^orange;Auto-Assembler^reset;. Show me it when you're done.

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;Frackin'Universe数据库^reset;这位科学家(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Lab Directory^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 现在把它带到你的基地，并把它放在萃取设备，离心机或其他生产站旁边。多用用，你很快就会发现它是一个多么NB的神器。
Texts.Eng: Now take that to your base and place it next to an extractor, centrifuge or other production station. Access it, and you'll soon see just how amazing a device it truly is.
